xdi2.core.io

Class AbstractXDIReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.io.AbstractXDIReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, XDIReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoReader, XDIDisplayReader, XDIJSONQuadReader, XDIJSONReader, XDIJXDReader, XDIRawJSONReader

    public abstract class AbstractXDIReader
extends Object
implements XDIReader
    If you extend this class, you only have to implement read(Graph, Reader, Properties)
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
